name: Nurse Jackie
description: Meet your new herbal caretaker, Nurse Jackie. She's an 85/15 sativa-dominant hybrid originally bred by Homegrown Natural Wonders, who crossed Jack the Ripper with Medicine Woman to create this sour lemon-flavored strain. Nurse Jackie is a dependable medicine no matter how early in the day it may be; her unencumbered, clear-headed buzz allows you to go about your day with relative ease, but novice consumers should be aware that this strain typically boasts a high THC content which can induce anxiety in some individuals. All phenotypes stretch tall, but Nurse Jackie can either lean toward the sour, rounded buds of Medicine Woman or the citrus-smelling, pointed flowers characteristic of Jack the Ripper.
descriptionPlain: Meet your new herbal caretaker, Nurse Jackie. She's an 85/15 sativa-dominant hybrid originally bred by Homegrown Natural Wonders, who crossed Jack the Ripper with Medicine Woman to create this sour lemon-flavored strain. Nurse Jackie is a dependable medicine no matter how early in the day it may be; her unencumbered, clear-headed buzz allows you to go about your day with relative ease, but novice consumers should be aware that this strain typically boasts a high THC content which can induce anxiety in some individuals. All phenotypes stretch tall, but Nurse Jackie can either lean toward the sour, rounded buds of Medicine Woman or the citrus-smelling, pointed flowers characteristic of Jack the Ripper.

highlightedReviews.text:
After searching high and low for Medicine Woman, I was at a local dispensary and tried out Nurse Jackie based on the tested %
Loved how the strain smoked enough to go back & get more, and when I did, I realized why I liked it so much, one of its parents: Medicine Woman! Great for cramps and other pains, every chance I find it, I get it!

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Blue Heron, Haze Heaven, Grimace, Garlic Bud, and Nurse Jackie
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
New strains are here, and many more are on the way! Using the Leafly app, it's now possible to nominate strains for inclusion in the Explorer. Simply enter the strain into the search bar on the "Explore Strains" page, and if no results surface, you'll be given the option to submit this variety. Keep in mind that we won't be able to tend to all requests, but we'll do what we can to make it happen as long as we can still eat, sleep, and go home every once in while.
   1. Blue Heron
Characteristics of Blue Heron:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Blue Magoo and Huckleberry
Breeder: Dynasty Seeds
Blueberry, rose, and citrus aroma
Flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks

   2. Haze Heaven
Characteristics of Haze Heaven:

60/40 indica-domintant hybrid
Cross between Northern Lights #5, Haze, Afghani, and Hawaiian
Breeder: Soma Seeds
Musky, spicy aroma
Buzzing cerebral energy paired with mellow, relaxing body effects
Flowering time of 10 to 11 weeks

   3. Grimace
Characteristics of Grimace: 

Mostly indica strain
Unknown genetics
Sedating, mellow effects
Grows into large, conic, purple buds (that may or may not look just like this off-putting fast-food mascot)

   4. Garlic Bud
Characteristics of Garlic Bud:

Mostly indica strain
Bred using Afghani genetics
Breeder: The Seed Bank (now Sensi Seeds)
Pungent spicy, musky aroma
Relaxing body effects coupled with an invigorating cerebral buzz
Flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks

   5. Nurse Jackie
Characteristics of Nurse Jackie:

85/15 sativa-dominant strain
Cross between Jack the Ripper and Medicine Woman
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Sour citrus aroma
Clear-headed, functional buzz

growInfo.growNotes: Top early to increase height and yield
